name: Surf's Up (itch) (B-UpGames)
description:
Surf's Up Concept:

Surf's Up is a 2D fast-paced platformer with a focus on record-setting time trials, upgrading your gear, and gathering collectibles. Hop out of helicopters into 4 different world destinations: Islands, Arctic, Jungle and Far East(Locked In Demo Vers). Surf during the day, or risk it after nightfall. Chill in the surf shop, shop for new boards, and continue your journey as 4 unlockable surfers with unique abilities.

Controls:

Controller (Xbox)

         A = Jump

         X = Attack

         X(Hold) = Surf Fast

         B = Special

 Keyboard

         / = Jump

         Right Shift = Attack/Surf Fast

         Right Shift(Hold) = Attack/Surf Fast

         Right Control = Special
